name: VWAP Bollinger Mean Reversion
description: Mean-reversion strategy for large-cap equities on daily bars. Takes long trades when price closes below 20-day 2.5σ lower Bollinger Band and ≥1.5 % under same-day VWAP with volume >20-day average; shorts on symmetrical overbought signal. Exits when price re-enters bands or reaches VWAP. Uses 1 % equity risk per position with 3 % hard stop and 4 % profit cap.
